title: Aamir Khan starrer Dangal to be shot at veteran actor Dharmendra’s village
text:
Aamir Khan starrer Dangal to be shot at veteran actor Dharmendra’s village By Maggie Davis on October 23, 2015 at 10:22 PM Comments Aamir Khan is gearing up for his upcoming flick ‘Dangal’ in which he would be sporting the role of a wrestler. Aamir’s beefed up physique, the first poster has become a huge rage amongst his fans. The movie directed by Nitesh Tiwari is based upon legendary wrestler, Mahavir Phogat, a Haryanvi. Lately we had even heard that Aamir has given up his high-end gym equipment as he prefers to go for the traditional way. To get the perfect wrestler, Aamir wanted to practice in the local akhadas of Ludhiana where the shoot is also taking place. Now there is an interesting news for the all the fans of veteran actor Dharmendra. There are reports that Aamir would soon be moving to a village named Dango where the rest of the shoot would be taking place. Dango in the Pakhowal Tehsil, Ludhiana is the ancestral village of the veteran superstar. (ALSO READ: Aamir Khan working out in Ludhiana’s akhadas for Dangal) According to media reports, when Aamir got to know about it he immediately got in touch Dharmendra and discussed the details of the upcoming flick. The super glad ‘Sholay’ actor conveyed his good wishes to B-town’s Mr. Perfectionist. On this Aamir promised to hold a special screening of ‘Dangal’ for Dharmendra. The movie that is produced by UTV in association with Aamir Khan Films is all set to hit the silver screens on December 23, 2016.
